General.Name: YiDong Electronics Technology Co. Ltd.
General.Description: YD Electronic Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of FPC boards, connector components, LED backlight modules, and other precision electronic components in China. The company offers precision stamping parts, terminals, and frames; LED backlight modules; and connector components, such as optical communication components, precision structural parts, and LCD connectors, as well as molds. Its products are used in consumer electronics, communication, new energy, automotive electronics, industrial, and medical fields. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Dongguan, China.
